Utilities

rangeof(iterable)

Equivalent for range(len(iterable))

Non-max suppression for shapefile bounding boxes

{% raw %}

non_max_suppression_fast[source]

non_max_suppression_fast(boxes, scores, overlap_thresh:float, sort_criterion:str='score')

Possibility to sort boxes by score (default) or area

Math formulae (for fallen deadwood volume estimation)

{% raw %}

cone_v[source]

cone_v(r:float, h:float)

V = (Ah)/3

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

cut_cone_v[source]

cut_cone_v(r_1:float, r_2:float, h:float)

V = (h(A + sqrt(A*A') + A))/3
